metadata.synopsis: At the Emperor's Feeding Room, you can interact with a broken brain jar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on the broken brain jar at Emperor's Feeding Room.S_LOW_Elfsong_Basement_BrainJar_f9096cc9-0463-4511-9d54-1a30d4e7281f

0.text: An old container for brains. Empty - shame. It would have been nice to find one to sustain me now.
